DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study is that prolonged-storage RBCs are not inferior to short-storage RBCs for the time required to clear elevated blood lactate levels in children with severe anemia.
DOC.brief_title: RBC Transfusion in Severe Anemia With Lactic Acidosis
DOC.detailed_description: This study will measure the time to resolution of lactic acidosis in patients with severe anemia following blood transfusion.
DOC.criteria: Age 6 mos to 5 years Hg < 5 g/dL and Lactate > 5 mM Receiving transfusion other than RBCs Children with known or suspected cardiac disease
